name: UnityActivateLicenseTask
description: Activates a Unity license on the agent.
helpMarkDown: Use this task to activate a Unity Plus/Pro license on the executing agent machine. [More Information](https://unitydevops.com/docs/unity-activate-license-task)
author: Dinomite Studios

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: The username used to activate the Unity Editor.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The password used to activate the Unity Editor.

inputs.name: serial
inputs.label: Serial
inputs.helpMarkDown: Serial key used to activate the Unity Editor. The serial key must be assigned to the user defined by username and password above.

inputs.name: versionSelectionMode
inputs.label: Unity version to use activate the license with
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select which Unity version to install. You can either use the project's version or specify a version yourself.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Unity editor version to activate the license with, e.g. value: `2022.2.1f1`.

inputs.name: unityEditorsPathMode
inputs.label: Unity editors location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define where to look for Unity installations on the agent.

options.environmentVariable: Use UNITYHUB_EDITORS_FOLDER_LOCATION environment variable on agent

inputs.name: customUnityEditorsPath
inputs.label: Editors folder location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify where to look for Unity Editor versions on the agent.

inputs.name: unityProjectPath
inputs.label: Unity project path
inputs.helpMarkDown: (Optional) Enter the directory path to the Unity project. If no value is entered, the root of the repository will be used.

inputs.name: deactivateSeatOnComplete
inputs.label: Deactivate seat on complete
inputs.helpMarkDown: By default the seat activation is released again after the pipeline has run. Uncheck this to keep the activation active.

outputVariables.name: logsOutputPath
outputVariables.description: Path to the Unity editor log files generated.

messages.successSkipReturn: The Unity editor license was not returned since disabled in task settings.
messages.failUnity: The Unity process failed with exit code
messages.projectPathInfo: Determining Unity editor version for project at
messages.warningAlphaBetaVersion: You are using a Unity Alpha/Beta version. It may not be supported by the extension!
messages.failGetUnityEditorVersion: Fail, Unity editor version not found
